text: Pierre Brice (born Pierre-Louis Baron de Bris; 6 February 1929 - 6 June 2015) was a French actor and singer. He began his career in the 1950s. He was best known for his role as the Apaca chief Winnetou in the German Karl May movies. Brice was born in Brest. He fought for the French Army in the First Indochina War. He was married to Hella Krekel from 1981 until his death. Brice died from pneumonia on 6 June 2015 in Paris.
